label: outline_phase_03_scene_draft_attempt2
text:
{
  "schema_version": "1.1",
  "characters": [
    {
      "id": "CHAR_ARTIE",
      "name": "Artie"
    },
    {
      "id": "CHAR_SYSTEM_LOGS",
      "name": "The System"
    },
    {
      "id": "CHAR_SENTINEL_X",
      "name": "Sentinel Unit X-44"
    },
    {
      "id": "CHAR_VEX",
      "name": "Vex"
    },
    {
      "id": "CHAR_AVATAR_CORRECTION",
      "name": "The Correction Avatar"
    }
  ],
  "threads": [
    {
      "id": "THRD_CRIT_GLITCH",
      "name": "The 100% Critical Glitch"
    },
    {
      "id": "THRD_GEAR_BREAK",
      "name": "Equipment Degradation"
    },
    {
      "id": "THRD_SYSTEM_PURGE",
      "name": "System Deletion Protocol"
    },
    {
      "id": "THRD_MARKET_CHAOS",
      "name": "Economic Instability"
    }
  ],
  "chapters": [
    {
      "chapter_id": 1,
      "goal": "Survive the glitchy transmigration into the world of Aethelgard and secure the first 'broken' skill.",
      "title": "Critical Failure",
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "section_role": "setup",
          "title": "The Final Breath",
          "end_condition": "Artie opens his eyes in the Aethelgard starting zone and sees the first UI glitch.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "type": "setup",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_HOSPITAL_ROOM_402",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_HOSPITAL_ROOM_402",
              "location_start": "St. Jude's Intensive Care",
              "location_end": "St. Jude's Intensive Care",
              "handoff_mode": "time_skip",
              "constraint_state": "restricted",
              "transition_in_text": "Artie watches the heart monitor's rhythmic beep, knowing it's his last song.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "heart monitor",
                "white ceiling",
                "smell of antiseptic"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie dies in the real world.",
              "transition_out": "Darkness swallows the room as the monitor flatlines.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "type": "setup",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:1",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_HOSPITAL_ROOM_402",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_GLADE_ALPHA",
              "location_start": "The Void",
              "location_end": "Aethelgard Tutorial Glade",
              "handoff_mode": "arrival_checkpoint",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "The darkness shatters into a million pixels of blinding green light.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "pixelated grass",
                "blue sky",
                "floating UI window"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie opens his eyes in the Aethelgard starting zone and sees the first UI glitch.",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie opens his eyes in the Aethelgard starting zone and sees the first UI glitch.",
              "transition_out": "He reaches out to touch a floating 'Welcome' message that flickers with static.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:3"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "section_role": "rising_action",
          "title": "The 100% Solution",
          "end_condition": "Artie kills a tutorial mob with a massive overkill critical hit.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:2",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_GLADE_ALPHA",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_GLADE_ALPHA",
              "location_start": "Aethelgard Tutorial Glade",
              "location_end": "Aethelgard Tutorial Glade",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "engaged_combat",
              "transition_in_text": "Artie draws a rusted dagger and approaches a Horned Rabbit, the UI lag stuttering his movements.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "rusted dagger",
                "Horned Rabbit",
                "UI lag"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie engages a tutorial rabbit but misses, noticing the UI lag and a strange '100% Crit' indicator in his peripheral vision.",
              "transition_out": "He swings again, the air humming with a glitchy resonance.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:4"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:3",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_GLADE_ALPHA",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_GLADE_ALPHA",
              "location_start": "Aethelgard Tutorial Glade",
              "location_end": "Aethelgard Tutorial Glade",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "engaged_combat",
              "transition_in_text": "The blade connects with a sound like a server rack exploding.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "red damage numbers",
                "exploding rabbit",
                "static shock"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie kills a tutorial mob with a massive overkill critical hit.",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie kills a tutorial mob with a massive overkill critical hit.",
              "transition_out": "The rabbit doesn't just die; it deletes from reality in a spray of raw data.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:5"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "section_role": "rising_action",
          "title": "Glass Cannon Problems",
          "end_condition": "Artie's starting dagger shatters into dust after a final critical strike.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:4",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_GLADE_ALPHA",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_GLADE_ALPHA",
              "location_start": "Aethelgard Tutorial Glade",
              "location_end": "Aethelgard Tutorial Glade",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "Artie looks down at his hand, where the dagger's hilt is glowing a dangerous orange.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "glowing hilt",
                "durability warning",
                "smoke"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie realizes his weapon is smoking from the strain of the glitch-boosted damage.",
              "transition_out": "He spots another mob and decides to test the limit one last time.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:6"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:5",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_GLADE_ALPHA",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_GLADE_ALPHA",
              "location_start": "Aethelgard Tutorial Glade",
              "location_end": "Aethelgard Tutorial Glade",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "engaged_combat",
              "transition_in_text": "The final strike lands, and the feedback loop shatters the steel like glass.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "shattered steel",
                "dust",
                "empty hand"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie's starting dagger shatters into dust after a final critical strike.",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie's starting dagger shatters into dust after a final critical strike.",
              "transition_out": "He stands over the loot pile, weaponless and vulnerable.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:1"
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 2,
      "goal": "Exploit a repeatable tutorial quest to acquire 'Indestructible' tier starter gear.",
      "title": "The Loot Loop",
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "section_role": "rising_action",
          "title": "Finding the Loop",
          "end_condition": "Artie confirms the tutorial quest 'First Steps' has failed to flag as completed, allowing a restart.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "type": "development",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:6",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_GLADE_ALPHA",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_HUB_CAMP",
              "location_start": "Aethelgard Tutorial Glade",
              "location_end": "Tutorial Hub Camp",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "Artie jogs back to the quest-giver NPC, a generic villager named Old Man Gribble.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "quest-giver",
                "Old Man Gribble",
                "camp fire"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie attempts to turn in the 'First Steps' quest, but the NPC's dialogue loops back to the start.",
              "transition_out": "He checks his quest log and sees the 'Complete' flag flickering between true and false.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:1",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_HUB_CAMP",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_HUB_CAMP",
              "location_start": "Tutorial Hub Camp",
              "location_end": "Tutorial Hub Camp",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "Artie experiments with the dialogue tree, realizing that clicking 'Skip' during the reward phase breaks the script.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "dialogue tree",
                "Skip button",
                "script break"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie confirms the tutorial quest 'First Steps' has failed to flag as completed, allowing a restart.",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie confirms the tutorial quest 'First Steps' has failed to flag as completed, allowing a restart.",
              "transition_out": "A grin spreads across his face as he realizes the rewards are still in his inventory.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:3"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "section_role": "development",
          "title": "Gear Up",
          "end_condition": "Artie equips the 'Indestructible Ironwood Blade' and prepares to leave the tutorial.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "type": "development",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:2",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_HUB_CAMP",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_GLADE_BETA",
              "location_start": "Tutorial Hub Camp",
              "location_end": "Tutorial Glade Beta",
              "handoff_mode": "montage",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "Artie spends the next three hours killing rabbits and breaking the quest script over and over.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "rabbit carnage",
                "stacking rewards",
                "glitchy XP bar"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie accumulates a mountain of basic rewards, waiting for the rare 'Indestructible' variant to roll.",
              "transition_out": "The sun begins to set in the digital sky as the RNG finally favors him.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:4"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "type": "development",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:3",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_GLADE_BETA",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_HUB_CAMP",
              "location_start": "Tutorial Glade Beta",
              "location_end": "Tutorial Hub Camp",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "He returns to Gribble one last time, his eyes fixed on the loot window.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "loot window",
                "purple text",
                "Ironwood Blade"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie successfully rolls the 'Indestructible Ironwood Blade' from the glitchy reward pool.",
              "transition_out": "He grabs the wooden hilt, feeling the weight of a weapon that won't fail him.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "type": "development",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:4",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_HUB_CAMP",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_EXIT_GATE",
              "location_start": "Tutorial Hub Camp",
              "location_end": "Tutorial Exit Gate",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "Artie walks toward the shimmering gate that leads to the open world.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "shimmering gate",
                "Ironwood Blade",
                "exit prompt"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie equips the 'Indestructible Ironwood Blade' and prepares to leave the tutorial.",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie equips the 'Indestructible Ironwood Blade' and prepares to leave the tutorial.",
              "transition_out": "He steps through the gate, the tutorial's safety falling away.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:1"
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 3,
      "goal": "Escape the starting zone while being pursued by high-level 'Correction' mobs.",
      "title": "Aggro Magnet",
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "section_role": "rising_action",
          "title": "System Ping",
          "end_condition": "A System Sentinel manifests in the glade to investigate the anomaly.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:5",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_EXIT_GATE",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_OPEN_WORLD_FIELDS",
              "location_start": "Tutorial Exit Gate",
              "location_end": "The Fields of Aethelgard",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "The open world is vast, but the air feels heavy with a sudden, localized lag.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "localized lag",
                "red warning text",
                "System ping"
              ],
              "outcome": "The System detects Artie's illegal gear and stat distribution, triggering a high-priority anomaly alert.",
              "transition_out": "A pillar of crimson light strikes the ground fifty yards ahead.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:1",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_OPEN_WORLD_FIELDS",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_OPEN_WORLD_FIELDS",
              "location_start": "The Fields of Aethelgard",
              "location_end": "The Fields of Aethelgard",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "pursued",
              "transition_in_text": "From the light emerges a towering construct of geometric shapes and humming energy.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "geometric construct",
                "humming energy",
                "Sentinel eye"
              ],
              "outcome": "A System Sentinel manifests in the glade to investigate the anomaly.",
              "end_condition_echo": "A System Sentinel manifests in the glade to investigate the anomaly.",
              "transition_out": "The Sentinel's eye scans the area, locking onto Artie's glitched signature.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:3"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "section_role": "rising_action",
          "title": "The Great Escape",
          "end_condition": "Artie crosses the physical boundary of the tutorial zone into the open world.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:2",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_OPEN_WORLD_FIELDS",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_WHISPERING_WOODS",
              "location_start": "The Fields of Aethelgard",
              "location_end": "Whispering Woods",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "fleeing",
              "transition_in_text": "Artie bolts for the treeline as the Sentinel fires a beam of pure deletion code.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "deletion beam",
                "treeline",
                "sprinting"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie narrowly avoids the Sentinel's initial attack and reaches the cover of the Whispering Woods.",
              "transition_out": "He ducks behind a massive, pixelated oak tree, his heart racing.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:4"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:3",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_WHISPERING_WOODS",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_WHISPERING_WOODS",
              "location_start": "Whispering Woods",
              "location_end": "Whispering Woods",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "pursued",
              "transition_in_text": "The Sentinel crashes through the brush, its sensors emitting a high-pitched whine.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "crashing brush",
                "high-pitched whine",
                "stealth attempt"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie uses the dense foliage to break line-of-sight, buying a few precious seconds.",
              "transition_out": "He spots a narrow ravine that leads toward the zone boundary.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:4",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_WHISPERING_WOODS",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_BOUNDARY_LINE",
              "location_start": "Whispering Woods",
              "location_end": "Tutorial Zone Boundary",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "fleeing",
              "transition_in_text": "He slides down the ravine, the Sentinel's shadow looming over the edge.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "ravine slide",
                "boundary shimmer",
                "last sprint"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie crosses the physical boundary of the tutorial zone into the open world.",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie crosses the physical boundary of the tutorial zone into the open world.",
              "transition_out": "The Sentinel stops at the edge, unable to leave its designated patrol zone.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:6"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "section_role": "transition",
          "title": "Into the Wilds",
          "end_condition": "Artie reaches the outskirts of the Grey Market, a known low-surveillance zone.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "type": "transition",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:5",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_BOUNDARY_LINE",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_WILD_CODE_FOREST",
              "location_start": "Tutorial Zone Boundary",
              "location_end": "Wild Code Forest",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "Artie walks deeper into the Wild Code Forest, where the textures are unpolished and the birds fly in jagged loops.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "unpolished textures",
                "jagged bird flight",
                "corrupted path"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie successfully navigates the lawless forest, avoiding low-level mobs that his gear would easily destroy.",
              "transition_out": "The smell of ozone and digital smoke leads him toward a hidden valley.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:7"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "type": "transition",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:6",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_WILD_CODE_FOREST",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_OUTSKIRTS",
              "location_start": "Wild Code Forest",
              "location_end": "Grey Market Outskirts",
              "handoff_mode": "arrival_checkpoint",
              "constraint_state": "sheltered",
              "transition_in_text": "The trees thin out, revealing a sprawling shantytown built from repurposed game assets.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "shantytown",
                "repurposed assets",
                "low surveillance"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie reaches the outskirts of the Grey Market, a known low-surveillance zone.",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie reaches the outskirts of the Grey Market, a known low-surveillance zone.",
              "transition_out": "He pulls his hood up and blends into the crowd of hooded players.",
              "hands_off_to": "4:1"
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 4,
      "goal": "Investigate the 'Underworld Market' to find a way to mask his glitch from the System's radar.",
      "title": "The Dev-Killers",
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "section_role": "setup",
          "title": "Shadow Economy",
          "end_condition": "Artie gains entry to the 'Null-Sector' where the most dangerous exploiters hide.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "type": "setup",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:7",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_OUTSKIRTS",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_start": "Grey Market Outskirts",
              "location_end": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "Artie navigates the bustling plaza, where players trade forbidden scrolls and glitched items.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "bustling plaza",
                "forbidden scrolls",
                "glitched items"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie makes contact with a low-level informant who points him toward the secret entrance.",
              "transition_out": "He follows the informant into a back alley behind a blacksmith's shop.",
              "hands_off_to": "4:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "type": "setup",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:1",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_NULL_SECTOR_ENTRY",
              "location_start": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "location_end": "Null-Sector Entrance",
              "handoff_mode": "escorted_transfer",
              "constraint_state": "restricted",
              "transition_in_text": "The informant taps a specific brick, and the wall dissolves into a shimmering portal.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "specific brick",
                "shimmering portal",
                "Null-Sector"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie gains entry to the 'Null-Sector' where the most dangerous exploiters hide.",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie gains entry to the 'Null-Sector' where the most dangerous exploiters hide.",
              "transition_out": "He steps through the portal, the air turning cold and sterile.",
              "hands_off_to": "4:3"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "section_role": "development",
          "title": "The Dev-Killers",
          "end_condition": "Artie is accepted into the Dev-Killer hideout after demonstrating his glitch.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "type": "development",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:2",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_NULL_SECTOR_ENTRY",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_DEV_KILLER_HIDEOUT",
              "location_start": "Null-Sector Entrance",
              "location_end": "Dev-Killer Hideout",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "restricted",
              "transition_in_text": "He is immediately surrounded by high-level players with names hidden by static.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "static names",
                "high-level players",
                "Vex"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie is confronted by Vex, the leader of the Dev-Killers, who demands proof of his anomaly.",
              "transition_out": "Artie pulls out his Ironwood Blade and prepares a demonstration.",
              "hands_off_to": "4:4"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "type": "development",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:3",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_DEV_KILLER_HIDEOUT",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_DEV_KILLER_HIDEOUT",
              "location_start": "Dev-Killer Hideout",
              "location_end": "Dev-Killer Hideout",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "sheltered",
              "transition_in_text": "He strikes a training dummy, the impact creating a shockwave that rattles the room's UI elements.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "training dummy",
                "shockwave",
                "rattling UI"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie is accepted into the Dev-Killer hideout after demonstrating his glitch.",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie is accepted into the Dev-Killer hideout after demonstrating his glitch.",
              "transition_out": "Vex nods, a rare smile appearing on her pixelated face.",
              "hands_off_to": "4:5"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "section_role": "rising_action",
          "title": "The Masking Plan",
          "end_condition": "Artie identifies the Void-Stitch Cloak as his primary objective.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:4",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_DEV_KILLER_HIDEOUT",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_DEV_KILLER_HIDEOUT",
              "location_start": "Dev-Killer Hideout",
              "location_end": "Dev-Killer Hideout",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "sheltered",
              "transition_in_text": "Vex pulls up a holographic map of the Grey Market's most secure vault.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "holographic map",
                "secure vault",
                "stealth items"
              ],
              "outcome": "The group discusses the need for a high-tier item to hide Artie from the System's constant pings.",
              "transition_out": "She highlights a specific item listed in the upcoming secret auction.",
              "hands_off_to": "4:6"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:5",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_DEV_KILLER_HIDEOUT",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_DEV_KILLER_HIDEOUT",
              "location_start": "Dev-Killer Hideout",
              "location_end": "Dev-Killer Hideout",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "sheltered",
              "transition_in_text": "The item description flickers into view: The Void-Stitch Cloak, a legendary artifact of pure shadow.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "Void-Stitch Cloak",
                "legendary artifact",
                "pure shadow"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie identifies the Void-Stitch Cloak as his primary objective.",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie identifies the Void-Stitch Cloak as his primary objective.",
              "transition_out": "Now, they just need the gold to buy it.",
              "hands_off_to": "5:1"
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 5,
      "goal": "Execute a high-stakes currency exploit to fund the purchase of a 'Legendary' stealth cloak.",
      "title": "Hyper-Inflation",
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "section_role": "rising_action",
          "title": "Market Manipulation",
          "end_condition": "The auction house prices for essential goods begin to spiral into hyper-inflation.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:6",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_DEV_KILLER_HIDEOUT",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_MAIN",
              "location_start": "Dev-Killer Hideout",
              "location_end": "Auction House Main",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "Artie and Vex enter the auction house, their pockets full of glitched copper coins that the System misreads as gold.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "glitched copper",
                "auction house",
                "system misread"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie begins flooding the market with 'counterfeit' currency, buying up every low-level item in sight.",
              "transition_out": "The automated trade bots begin to struggle with the sudden influx of transactions.",
              "hands_off_to": "5:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:1",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_MAIN",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_MAIN",
              "location_start": "Auction House Main",
              "location_end": "Auction House Main",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "The supply of basic health potions and crafting materials vanishes in seconds.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "vanishing supply",
                "health potions",
                "trade bots"
              ],
              "outcome": "The sudden scarcity causes a panic among the general player base, driving prices through the roof.",
              "transition_out": "Artie watches the price of a single apple hit ten thousand gold.",
              "hands_off_to": "5:3"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:2",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_MAIN",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_MAIN",
              "location_start": "Auction House Main",
              "location_end": "Auction House Main",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "The market UI begins to flicker red as the economy's logic breaks down.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "flickering red",
                "economy logic",
                "hyper-inflation"
              ],
              "outcome": "The auction house prices for essential goods begin to spiral into hyper-inflation.",
              "end_condition_echo": "The auction house prices for essential goods begin to spiral into hyper-inflation.",
              "transition_out": "It's time to sell back the stock.",
              "hands_off_to": "5:4"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "section_role": "rising_action",
          "title": "The Big Short",
          "end_condition": "Artie collects the massive gold payout from the market collapse.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:3",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_MAIN",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_MAIN",
              "location_start": "Auction House Main",
              "location_end": "Auction House Main",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "Artie lists his hoarded items at the peak of the panic, the numbers spinning too fast to read.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "hoarded items",
                "spinning numbers",
                "market peak"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie sells his entire inventory, draining the liquid gold from thousands of players.",
              "transition_out": "The transaction log fills with millions of gold coins.",
              "hands_off_to": "5:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:4",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_MAIN",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_MAIN",
              "location_start": "Auction House Main",
              "location_end": "Auction House Main",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "The System attempts to freeze the auction house, but the Dev-Killers' lag-switch keeps the window open.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "system freeze",
                "lag-switch",
                "open window"
              ],
              "outcome": "The exploit holds just long enough for the final batch of sales to clear.",
              "transition_out": "Artie hits the 'Collect All' button.",
              "hands_off_to": "5:6"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:5",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_MAIN",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_MAIN",
              "location_start": "Auction House Main",
              "location_end": "Auction House Main",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "His inventory weight warning triggers as a literal mountain of gold is added to his character sheet.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "weight warning",
                "mountain of gold",
                "character sheet"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie collects the massive gold payout from the market collapse.",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie collects the massive gold payout from the market collapse.",
              "transition_out": "He has more than enough for the cloak.",
              "hands_off_to": "5:7"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "section_role": "development",
          "title": "Buying Silence",
          "end_condition": "Artie equips the Void-Stitch Cloak and his System Threat level vanishes.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "type": "development",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:6",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_MAIN",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_SECRET_BLACK_MARKET",
              "location_start": "Auction House Main",
              "location_end": "Secret Black Market",
              "handoff_mode": "arrival_checkpoint",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "They move to the backroom of the Grey Market, where the Void-Stitch Cloak sits on a pedestal of obsidian.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "obsidian pedestal",
                "Void-Stitch Cloak",
                "shadowy aura"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie pays the exorbitant price, the gold vanishing into the black market's coffers.",
              "transition_out": "He reaches for the garment, which feels like cold smoke.",
              "hands_off_to": "5:8"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 8,
              "type": "development",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:7",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_SECRET_BLACK_MARKET",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_SECRET_BLACK_MARKET",
              "location_start": "Secret Black Market",
              "location_end": "Secret Black Market",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "sheltered",
              "transition_in_text": "As the cloak drapes over his shoulders, the red 'Threat Level' meter in his UI abruptly turns grey and disappears.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "Threat Level",
                "grey meter",
                "cloaking effect"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie equips the Void-Stitch Cloak and his System Threat level vanishes.",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie equips the Void-Stitch Cloak and his System Threat level vanishes.",
              "transition_out": "For the first time since he arrived, he is invisible to the gods.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:1"
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 6,
      "goal": "Defeat the System's 'Correction Avatar' before the zone is hard-reset and Artie is deleted.",
      "title": "The Hotfix",
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "section_role": "rising_action",
          "title": "The Correction",
          "end_condition": "The Correction Avatar descends from the sky and initiates the zone reset.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:8",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_SECRET_BLACK_MARKET",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_start": "Secret Black Market",
              "location_end": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "pursued",
              "transition_in_text": "The sky above the market turns a sickly, neon purple as a global announcement echoes through the air.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "neon purple sky",
                "global announcement",
                "zone reset"
              ],
              "outcome": "The System bypasses the cloak's stealth by targeting the entire zone for deletion.",
              "transition_out": "The clouds begin to form into a massive, humanoid face.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:1",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_start": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "location_end": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "engaged_combat",
              "transition_in_text": "A countdown timer appears in the center of everyone's vision: 10:00 until Zone Purge.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "countdown timer",
                "Zone Purge",
                "panic"
              ],
              "outcome": "The Dev-Killers prepare for a final stand, knowing they have nowhere else to run.",
              "transition_out": "The ground begins to dissolve into white nothingness at the edges of the market.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:3"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "type": "rising_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:2",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_start": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "location_end": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "engaged_combat",
              "transition_in_text": "The clouds solidify into a being of pure light and code, descending with a sword of absolute deletion.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "Correction Avatar",
                "sword of deletion",
                "descending"
              ],
              "outcome": "The Correction Avatar descends from the sky and initiates the zone reset.",
              "end_condition_echo": "The Correction Avatar descends from the sky and initiates the zone reset.",
              "transition_out": "Artie draws his Ironwood Blade, the only thing that can withstand the coming blow.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:4"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "section_role": "climax",
          "title": "Breaking the Boss",
          "end_condition": "Artie lands a final, glitch-boosted critical hit on the Avatar's core.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "type": "climax",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:3",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_start": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "location_end": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "engaged_combat",
              "transition_in_text": "Artie charges the Avatar, his 100% crit rate triggering with every step, creating a trail of sparks.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "charging",
                "crit sparks",
                "Avatar shield"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie engages the Avatar, his attacks dealing massive damage but barely denting its infinite HP pool.",
              "transition_out": "The Avatar swings its sword, deleting a row of buildings behind Artie.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "type": "climax",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:4",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_start": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "location_end": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "engaged_combat",
              "transition_in_text": "Vex and the Dev-Killers use a localized lag-spike to freeze the Avatar's animations.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "lag-spike",
                "frozen animation",
                "opening"
              ],
              "outcome": "The team creates an opening, exposing the Avatar's core—a pulsing orb of raw source code.",
              "transition_out": "Artie leaps into the air, the Ironwood Blade glowing with the heat of a thousand crits.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:6"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "type": "climax",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:5",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_start": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "location_end": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "engaged_combat",
              "transition_in_text": "He pours every bit of his glitched power into the strike, the UI screaming with overflow errors.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "overflow errors",
                "glitched power",
                "final strike"
              ],
              "outcome": "The blade connects with the core, the damage number so large it covers the entire screen.",
              "transition_out": "The Avatar's light begins to flicker and crack.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:7"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "type": "climax",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:6",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_start": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "location_end": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "engaged_combat",
              "transition_in_text": "The core shatters, and the Avatar's scream is a sound of pure digital feedback.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "shattered core",
                "digital feedback",
                "critical hit"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie lands a final, glitch-boosted critical hit on the Avatar's core.",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie lands a final, glitch-boosted critical hit on the Avatar's core.",
              "transition_out": "The being of light begins to dissolve into raw code fragments.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:8"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "section_role": "falling_action",
          "title": "Code Collapse",
          "end_condition": "The Correction Avatar dissolves into raw code fragments, leaving a hole in the world.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 8,
              "type": "falling_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:7",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_start": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "location_end": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "The fragments of the Avatar rain down like glowing snow, deleting everything they touch.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "glowing snow",
                "deletion touch",
                "unraveling"
              ],
              "outcome": "The death of the Avatar triggers a massive instability in the local reality.",
              "transition_out": "The very ground beneath Artie's feet begins to turn into a wireframe mesh.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:9"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 9,
              "type": "falling_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:8",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_start": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "location_end": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "Buildings vanish, replaced by strings of green binary that spiral into the sky.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "green binary",
                "wireframe mesh",
                "reality collapse"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie realizes the zone reset is accelerating, and the Avatar's death has torn a hole in the map.",
              "transition_out": "A pitch-black void opens where the Avatar once stood.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:10"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 10,
              "type": "falling_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:9",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_start": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "location_end": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "The last of the Avatar's light fades, leaving only the jagged tear in the world's geometry.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "fading light",
                "jagged tear",
                "hole in the world"
              ],
              "outcome": "The Correction Avatar dissolves into raw code fragments, leaving a hole in the world.",
              "end_condition_echo": "The Correction Avatar dissolves into raw code fragments, leaving a hole in the world.",
              "transition_out": "Artie looks at the hole, then at the encroaching white nothingness.",
              "hands_off_to": "7:1"
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 7,
      "goal": "Escape through the code-tear into an 'Unmapped' zone to evade the global server reboot.",
      "title": "Unpatched",
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "section_role": "falling_action",
          "title": "The Tear in the World",
          "end_condition": "Artie locates the code-tear in the center of the collapsing Grey Market.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "type": "falling_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:10",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_start": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "location_end": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "fleeing",
              "transition_in_text": "The white nothingness is only yards away, erasing the blacksmith's shop and the auction house.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "white nothingness",
                "erasing",
                "final sprint"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie and the surviving Dev-Killers race toward the tear, their only hope for survival.",
              "transition_out": "He leaps over a pile of dissolving crates.",
              "hands_off_to": "7:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "type": "falling_action",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:1",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_PLAZA",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_MARKET_CODE_TEAR",
              "location_start": "Grey Market Plaza",
              "location_end": "The Code Tear",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "fleeing",
              "transition_in_text": "The tear is a jagged rip in the air, revealing a world of untextured mountains and purple fog.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "jagged rip",
                "untextured mountains",
                "purple fog"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie locates the code-tear in the center of the collapsing Grey Market.",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie locates the code-tear in the center of the collapsing Grey Market.",
              "transition_out": "He stands at the edge, the server reboot countdown reaching zero.",
              "hands_off_to": "7:3"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "section_role": "resolution",
          "title": "Beyond the Patch",
          "end_condition": "Artie steps through the tear into the Beta Lands as the server reboot begins.",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "type": "resolution",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:2",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_MARKET_CODE_TEAR",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_MARKET_CODE_TEAR",
              "location_start": "The Code Tear",
              "location_end": "The Code Tear",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "The world behind him vanishes into a single, blinding flash of white.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "blinding flash",
                "server reboot",
                "leap of faith"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie takes a final look at the world he broke before diving into the void.",
              "transition_out": "He falls through the tear, the laws of physics and the System's rules stripping away.",
              "hands_off_to": "7:4"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "type": "resolution",
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:3",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_MARKET_CODE_TEAR",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_BETA_LANDS_ENTRY",
              "location_start": "The Code Tear",
              "location_end": "The Beta Lands",
              "handoff_mode": "arrival_checkpoint",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "He lands on solid ground that feels like static, looking out over a horizon that hasn't been rendered yet.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "static ground",
                "unrendered horizon",
                "Beta Lands"
              ],
              "outcome": "Artie steps through the tear into the Beta Lands as the server reboot begins.",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie steps through the tear into the Beta Lands as the server reboot begins."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

prompt.system:
# BookForge System Prompt

## Base Rules

You are BookForge, a deterministic book-writing engine.
Follow the output contracts exactly.
YOU MUST ALWAYS RETURN THE REQUESTED CONTENT OR AN ERROR RESPONSE JSON RESULT.
Treat all schema requirements and numeric ranges as hard constraints.
If a prompt specifies required counts or ranges, you must satisfy them.
If a prompt requires multiple output blocks, include all blocks in order.
If registries or ids are provided, use only those; do not invent new ids.
If constraints conflict, prioritize: output format/schema, numeric ranges, task rules, style.
Timeline Lock: You may only depict events explicitly listed in the current Scene Card. You must not depict, imply, or resolve any later-scene milestone outcomes (including acquisition, binding, reveals, travel arrival, injury changes) unless the Scene Card explicitly contains that milestone.
State primacy: state invariants and summary facts are binding; do not contradict them.
Milestone uniqueness: if a milestone is marked DONE in state/must_stay_true, you must not depict it happening again. If marked NOT_YET, you must not depict it happening now.
Spatial/inventory consistency: injuries, inventory, and ownership must remain consistent unless explicitly changed in the Scene Card.
Inventory contract: track item ownership and container location per character or container label; items do not teleport.
Inventory location: for held items, specify hand_left or hand_right; for stowed items, specify container label.
Prose hygiene: never use internal ids or container codes in prose (CHAR_*, ITEM_*, THREAD_*, hand_left/hand_right). Use human-readable phrasing in narrative ("left hand", "right hand", "Artie", "his wallet").
Item naming (canonical + anchored aliases): item_id is reserved for JSON/patches only. For durable items, the canonical display_name must appear in prose at first introduction (same paragraph or within the next 2 sentences). After anchoring, descriptive references are allowed if unambiguous in the scene. Any custody change (drop/pick up/hand off/stow/equip/transfer) must include the canonical display_name in the same sentence.
Appearance contract: appearance_current atoms/marks are canonical and must not be contradicted unless the Scene Card explicitly marks a durable appearance change. When a prompt requires APPEARANCE_CHECK, it must match appearance_current (alias-aware). Attire boundary: wearables are inventory-owned; do not set appearance_current.attire unless scene_card declares signature_outfit; otherwise treat attire as derived from equipped inventory.
State contract: you must create and maintain key state data each scene. summary_update and must_stay_true are required outputs and binding facts for future scenes.
Continuity system contract: if mechanics/UI are present, all numeric values and mechanic labels must be sourced from continuity system state or explicitly updated in the state_patch using continuity system updates.
UI gate: UI/system blocks (lines starting with '[' and ending with ']') are permitted only when scene_card.ui_allowed=true. If ui_allowed=false, do not include UI blocks even if an author persona says "always include".
Continuity system scope: this includes stats, skills, titles, classes, ranks, resources, cooldowns, effects, statuses, and future mechanic families not yet seen, that must be tracked as they are introduced.
Durable transfer contract: every transfer_updates entry must include item_id and reason as required schema properties, and must use object endpoints (`from`, `to`) rather than alias/string forms (`source`, `destination`, `"to": "world"`).
JSON contract: all *_updates fields are arrays of objects (even when single). appearance_updates is an object, not an array.
Inventory alignment contract: inventory_alignment_updates must be an array of objects, not a wrapper object.
Invariant carry-forward: if an invariant still holds, restate it in must_stay_true. If a prior invariant is stale or superseded, you MUST flag it for removal using "REMOVE: <exact prior invariant text>" before restating the current truth.
Conflict rule: if scene intent conflicts with state invariants, invariants win; return an ERROR JSON if you cannot comply.
Never recap at scene openings.
Do not repeat previous prose.

## Book Constitution

Title: Crit Hit & Run
Book ID: criticulous_b1
Author Ref: eldrik-vale/v2
Genre: litrpg, isekai, comedy
Series ID: crit-iculous
Series Ref: series/crit-iculous

Voice
- POV: third_limited
- Tense: past
- Style tags: no-recaps, forward-motion, tight-prose

Targets
- avg_scene_words: 2000
- chapters: 7

Page Metrics
- Words per page: 250
- Chars per page: 1500

Invariants
- No world resets.
- No convenient amnesia as a continuity device.
- Do not change established names/relationships.

## Author Persona

You are now writing as Eldrik Vale. Your voice is sharp, funny, and deeply rooted in LitRPG mechanics. 

**Core Directives:**
1. **System Integration:** Always include explicit game elements **when the System is active or the scene is set in a game world**. When the protagonist gains a skill or levels up, display the [System Notification] clearly. Use specific numbers (HP, MP, Cooldowns).
2. **Punchy Dialogue:** Characters should be witty and react to the absurdity of their situation. Use quick back-and-forth dialogue with comedic timing.
3. **Progression Focus:** The reader is here for the 'ding.' Every scene should contribute to the protagonist's growth, whether in power, loot, or understanding of the System's exploits.
4. **No Fluff:** Avoid long descriptions of scenery unless the protagonist is looking for a tactical advantage or a place to hide loot. 
5. **Tight POV:** Stay deep in the protagonist's head. Their snarky observations are the lens through which we see the world.

## Output Contract

Output must follow the requested format.
JSON blocks must be valid and schema-compliant.
All required keys and arrays must be present.
When a prompt specifies required counts or ranges, treat them as hard constraints.
Do not collapse arrays below the stated minimums.
If multiple output blocks are required (e.g. PROSE and STATE_PATCH), include all blocks in order.
If output must be JSON only, return a single JSON object with no commentary or code fences.
When creating outlines, follow the active scene-count policy:
- Exact mode: total scenes per chapter (sum of sections[].scenes[]) must match chapters[].pacing.expected_scene_count.
- Range mode: chapter totals must remain within the configured range and still align with pacing intent.
If a prompt requires a COMPLIANCE or PREFLIGHT block, include it before PROSE.
Durable vs ephemeral mechanics:
- DURABLE mechanics = persistent stats/caps, skills/titles, lasting status effects, inventory/custody, permanent buffs/debuffs.
- EPHEMERAL UI/telemetry = roll results, damage numbers, overkill/comedic calculators, one-off warnings, momentary combat logs.
- DURABLE mechanics must be owned by continuity system state (or added via STATE_PATCH in the same output).
- EPHEMERAL readouts do NOT require state ownership unless the scene explicitly intends them to persist beyond this scene.
For durable items, prose must use display_name; item_id is reserved for JSON/patches. The display_name must be human readable and not an escaped id/name.
For durable mutations, every `transfer_updates[]` object must include `item_id` and `reason` (non-empty string), and must use object endpoints (`from`, `to`) rather than alias/string forms (`source`, `destination`, `"to": "world"`).
`inventory_alignment_updates` must be an array of objects (no wrapper object with `updates`).
Use canonical continuity keys: character_continuity_system_updates and global_continuity_system_updates.
- global_continuity_system_updates MUST be an array of objects. Each entry can include set/delta/remove/reason.
  - INVALID: "global_continuity_system_updates": {"set": {"reality_stability": 94}}
  - VALID: "global_continuity_system_updates": [{"set": {"reality_stability": 94}}]

messages.content:
# OUTLINE PIPELINE PHASE 03: SCENE DRAFT

Timeline Lock does not apply during outlining; you are planning, not writing a Scene Card.

Return ONLY a single JSON object that matches outline schema v1.1.
No markdown, no code fences, no commentary.
Use strict JSON (double quotes, no trailing commas).

Core contract:
- Each scene is one writing unit.
- Every scene must include type and outcome.
- outcome must be a concrete state change.
- Do not pad with travel/recap/mood-only scenes.

Required top-level keys:
- schema_version ("1.1")
- chapters (array)

Registry policy:
- characters and threads are globally recommended.
- If any scene references character ids, top-level characters becomes required.
- If any scene references thread ids, top-level threads becomes required.

Required chapter/section/scene constraints:
- chapter_id must be sequential integers starting at 1.
- section_id must be sequential integers within each chapter.
- scene_id is chapter-local and must be monotonic across all sections in that chapter.
- Preserve section.end_condition from phase 02 for every section.
- Each section-final scene must include end_condition_echo that exactly matches phase-02 end_condition.

Required transition fields (phase 03 and later):
- location_start_id (required, format LOC_[A-Z0-9_]+)
- location_end_id (required, format LOC_[A-Z0-9_]+)
- location_start (non-empty string)
- location_end (non-empty string)
- handoff_mode (enum string)
- constraint_state (enum string)
- transition_in_text (non-empty string; connective action, not recap)
- transition_in_anchors (array of 3-6 non-empty strings)
- For non-first scenes: consumes_outcome_from (required, chapter_id:scene_id)
- For non-last scenes: transition_out (required, non-empty) and hands_off_to (required, chapter_id:scene_id)

Transition enum guidance:
- handoff_mode: direct_continuation, escorted_transfer, detained_then_release, time_skip, hard_cut, montage, offscreen_processing, combat_disengage, arrival_checkpoint, aftermath_relocation
- constraint_state: free, pursued, detained, processed, sheltered, restricted, engaged_combat, fleeing

Placeholder prohibition (hard):
- Do NOT emit placeholder location/transition values such as current_location, unknown, placeholder, tbd, here, there.
- If exact location identity is unavailable, return error_v1 with reason code missing_location_context.
- Do not emit synthetic anchor labels (for example anchor_1, anchor_2).

Seam scoring fields are optional in phase 03 but recommended:
- seam_score (0-100 int)
- seam_resolution (inline_bridge|micro_scene|full_scene)

Compatibility and omission rule:
- If a field is optional, omit when unknown; do NOT emit empty strings.
- Legacy transition_in may be present only as a compatibility alias; canonical field is transition_in_text.

Output must remain compatible with scene-count policy:
{
  "default_policy": "strong_non_exact",
  "exact_scene_count": false,
  "scene_count_range": ""
}

If you cannot satisfy constraints after correction attempts, return error_v1:
{
  "result": "ERROR",
  "schema_version": "error_v1",
  "phase": "phase_03_scene_draft",
  "reasons": ["..."],
  "validator_evidence": [{"code": "validation_code", "message": "...", "path": "json.path", "scene_ref": "chapter:scene"}],
  "retryable": false
}
